# Getting Started

Welcome to the sample book. This page demonstrates the content format.

## Code Example

```python
def hello():
    print("Hello, world!")
```

## Directives

:::goal
Learn the basics of the publishing framework.
:::

:::deliverables
- A working development environment
- Understanding of the project structure
:::
